title: ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS FOR BATTERY SYSTEM AND BESS ENCLOSURES
fullText:
In addition to the enclosure requirements specified in Clause 6.2.5, the installation of the battery system or BESS enclosure shall be in accordance with the following:
(a) The supporting surfaces or racks within the enclosure shall have structural strength to support the battery, battery modules or battery system weight.
(b) The deflection of the racks in the enclosure, after installation of the batteries or battery modules and after normal settlement has taken place under load, shall not be more than 3 mm.
(c) Any battery stand shall meet the requirements specified in Clauses 6.3.3.3 and 6.2.7.
